subject: Basketball
All Star Games
lead_paragraph: Both Madison Square Garden and Barclays Center have applied to host the 2015 N.B.A. game. No other cities are under consideration, making it a near certainty that New York will host the game.
snippet: Both Madison Square Garden and Barclays Center have applied to host the 2015 N.B.A. game. No other cities are under consideration, making it a near certainty that New York will host the game.
